subject: Re: [junit] Custom report
msgSnippet: Hi, U can get a good report using Ant. see jakrata Ant 1.3 It has option to automatically mail the report to specified person. Suresh ... This mail helped a
messageBody:
Hi,

U can get a good report using Ant. see jakrata Ant 1.3
It has option to automatically mail the report to specified person.

Suresh



Quoting Manjula Fernando <manjula@...>:

> Hi
>
> I need to create a custom report from the JUnit results(may be xml
> file).Has
> anyone done it.If so could you give me some idea.
> Is it possible by using junit.framework.TestResult class ?
> Thanks and Best Regards
> Manjula
>
>
>
